title: Blended e-Learning Course for Professional Development in Chronic Non-Cancer Pain Management

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental medical knowledge and understanding of clinical practice
context.additional_context: A blended course conducted in smartphone-based limited-technology environments, combining online learning modules with offline case discussions.

learning_goals: Learners can explain 20 or more core competencies in chronic non-cancer pain management
Learners will be able to apply at least two pain management approaches in actual clinical settings after training.
Learners will provide evidence-based rationale to actively recommend the educational program to peer healthcare professionals.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
